product_name: Yakima BikerBar Truck Bed Bike Rack
long_description: Piling bikes in your truck bed is a thing of the past. The Yakima BikeBar Truck Bed Bike rack secures two bikes in your truck bed, and keeps them from scratching each other and your sweet ride. The BikeBar clamps to your truck bed rails for quick, no-drill installation; Boa bike mounts attach to the bars, and can be manually spaced to keep bikes from touching. Medium kit includes a 66 in. crossbar; large kit includes a 78 in. crossbar. Includes SKS lock cores and keys so you can secure your bikes to the rack while enjoy post-ride drinks.
short_description: Piling bikes in your truck bed is a thing of the past. The Yakima BikeBar Truck Bed Bike rack secures two bikes in your truck bed, and keeps them from scratching each other and your sweet ride.
